name: Quantum Physics Laboratory
description: Dedicated to experimental quantum mechanics, atomic-scale measurements, and quantum computing prototypes. Outfitted with cryogenics, RF shielding, and vibration isolation systems.

name: Optics and Photonics Lab
equipment: Laser benches, Fiber optics kits, CCD sensors
description: Hands-on experimental setups for lasers, optical fibers, interferometers, and light-matter interaction. Emphasis on holography, quantum optics, and optical instrumentation.

name: Solid State Physics Lab
equipment: X-ray diffraction, Cryostats, Magnetic field testers
description: Specializes in the study of crystal structures, semiconductors, and nano-materials. Equipped with high-precision instrumentation for XRD, Hall effect, and resistivity measurements.

name: Computational Physics Lab
description: Focused on simulation, numerical methods, and data-driven physics modeling using Python, MATLAB, and C++ platforms.
